Character

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Utility.Entity
        • Character.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeCharacter, CivilianCharacter, ShopCharacter

    public abstract class Character
extends Entity
implements Interactable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Abstract class that determines what makes an entity a character in the game. Holds information such as character name, what direction it is facing, as well as time stamps and flags used by Collision.
    Version:
    2013-02-28
    Author:
    Alexander Persson & Jimmy Svensson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(int id,
         int x,
         int y,
         int width,
         int height,
         java.lang.String name,
         int health,
         boolean isAttackable,
         int radius)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        id - the id of a character
        x - the x coordination of a character
        y - the y coordination of a character
        width - the width of a character
        height - height the height of a character
        name - the name of a character
        health - the health of a character
        isAttackable - if a character is attackable or not
        radius - the radius of a character (is used to get the sense area of a character)
